content: start working along the side of the hat and then start the tab you will now be working in row and turning your work row 1 working along the side of hat chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in next 14 single_crochet mark next 3 sts with st marker starting tab chain 6 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook & next 4 chs slip_stitch in 1st marked st chain 1 turn 20 single_crochet row 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet row 3 single_crochet in each single_crochet across slip_stitch in 2nd marked st ch1 turn 5 single_crochet row 4 single_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet row 5 single_crochet in each single_crochet across slip_stitch in 3rd marked st do not turn single_crochet in remaining 32 sts along side of hat join with slip_stitch in beginning single_crochet from row 1 37 single_crochet finishing border chain 1 single_crochet in same st as chain 1 single_crochet in each st around sides and tab of hat slip_stitch in beginning single_crochet fasten_off and weave in loose ends fold tab up/over the band and sew button in place enjoy
